description: Ahmed Hossain is a celebrity chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He has received numerous awards and accolades for his cooking skills and is known for his fiery personality in the kitchen.

recipes.name: Shorshe Ilish
recipes.method: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3. Add the ground beef and cook until browned. 4. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened. 5. Add the tomato sauce and simmer for 10-15 minutes. 6. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. 2. Add the onion, garlic, and ginger and cook until the onion is softened. 3. Add the chicken and cook until browned. 4. Add the curry powder and stir to coat the chicken. 5. Add the coconut milk and simmer for 20-25 minutes. 6. Serve with rice.

recipes.name: Mutton Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Brush the salmon fillet with olive oil. 3. Season with salt and black pepper. 4. Grill the salmon for 10-12 minutes, or until it flakes easily with a fork. 5. Squeeze lemon juice over the top before serving.

description: Fakhruddin Ahmed is a British chef and television personality. He is known for his healthy and sustainable approach to cooking, and has written numerous cookbooks and hosted several cooking shows.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.method: 1. Cook the pasta according to package instructions. 2. Drain the pasta and return it to the pot. 3. Stir in the pesto sauce and cherry tomatoes. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with parmesan cheese. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.method: 1. Cook the egg noodles according to package instructions. 2. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3. Add the beef and cook until browned. 4. Add the onion and mushrooms and cook until softened. 5. Add the beef broth and simmer for 10-15 minutes. 6. Stir in the sour cream and serve over the egg noodles.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.method: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Brush the salmon fillet with olive oil. 3. Season with salt and black pepper. 4. Grill the salmon for 10-12 minutes, or until it flakes easily with a fork. 5. Squeeze lemon juice over the top before serving.
